titleStmt.title: An act for ministers and payment of tythes
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Streater and John Macock ...,

notesStmt.note: "Friday, March 16, 1659. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Thomas St. Nicholas, Clerk of the Parliament."
